rounds.response:
I have a low pair (pocket fives) against the big blind who only called the minimum so far. Typical ranges: an unraised pot heads-up vs. a random BB hand gives the fives ~63 % pre-flop equity. There’s already 30 in the pot, it’s a steal opportunity, and no betting pressure behind me.

I’ll raise to put pressure on any over-two-card holdings and try to win the pot right now without seeing a flop.

[Raise 40]
